title: CryptoSlater
author: CryptoSlater
content: It happenedhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J0egz0nnKbcWas already expecting it for months but now it's a banger

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoSlater on June 13, 2023, 07:23:31 PMIt happenedhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J0egz0nnKbcWas already expecting it for months but now it's a bangerAmazon has no official announcement of them launching AMZ token and searching about this will give you a number of Amaazon token scam pages. It will be careless of you to just buy ahead of this sale. If it's true you better just wait for the price to dip below $1.If there is something like this, I think Bezos would be the first to have said a word. But there is nothing I can find on the internet. This could be a scam.

comments.author: CryptoSlater
comments.body: It's legit because CoinMarketcap, Cointelegraph and CryptoSlate are all showing the news and it's mostly because of the partnered affiliate offer.Amazon is running a public sale later and that one will probably be announced on all Amazon channels, this is a bit different.And obviously there are many scams for any big brand + token nameThis isn't

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoSlater on June 13, 2023, 07:39:40 PMIt's legit because CoinMarketcap, Cointelegraph and CryptoSlate are all showing the news and it's mostly because of the partnered affiliate offer.Amazon is running a public sale later and that one will probably be announced on all Amazon channels, this is a bit different.And obviously there are many scams for any big brand + token nameThis isn't Just wait for the official announcement, though Amazon can really have their own coin to be used on their platform and that can benefit them a lot. I’m just worried that they can be the next target for SEC, so better for them to follow all the regulations on creating their own coin and make no mistakes, or else they will lose a lot later on. Let’s see if they will push this through, big companies are preparing for this moment for sure.

comments.author: timoshani
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoSlater on June 13, 2023, 07:23:31 PMIt happenedhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J0egz0nnKbcWas already expecting it for months but now it's a bangerIn my opinion, the Amazon token would be stated as one of the greatest cryptocurrencies in all crypto history. This fact regarding real big shopping platforms which are very popular in most world countries.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: The channel you share isn't the official Coinmarketcap youtube channel, it's just a channel that impersonates them. Coinmarketcap official channel has around 387K subscribers, while the channel you shared has 149K subscribers. Don't get carried away, mate. If Amazon issues tokens later, of course we'll find out soon.Quote from: timoshani on June 13, 2023, 10:09:28 PMIn my opinion, the Amazon token would be stated as one of the greatest cryptocurrencies in all crypto history. This fact regarding real big shopping platforms which are very popular in most world countries.Of course, with all the ecosystems currently owned by Amazon, we can say that later this token could become one of the best tokens.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: Uhm... The channel isn't even the official Coinmarketcap youtube channel? This is. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnhdZlwVd6ocXGhdSyV9AxgGot this from their https://linktr.ee/CoinMarketCapOfficial which I found in their Twitter linked to the official coinmarketcap website. AND if you look at the dumbass channel, this is the first video they have. The videos on the homepage? It's a playlist literally anyone could've copied from other famous channels. In this case, it isn't even the youtube account that OP linked, it's an account named "Christopher Tacon". Not to mention literally everything about the announcement was last year, where btw Amazon token scams most often made the news. If those stuff doesn't scream of scam to me, I don't know what will.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Be careful OP and everyone, I have a quick search about that Amazon token and these are what I've found out:(Amazon Token Crypto “Presale” Scam Takes Advantage of News Hype and Steals Your Real Cryptocurrency)(Beware of a New Amazon Token Crypto Scam)These were posted a year and two ago.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: OP is a scammer.He shared and promoted a scam token and fake youtube channel! DO NOT BUY ANYTHING because the youtube channel are scam. @OP tried to promoted scam channel and scam token to all different thread.Check his post.

comments.author: Teraboy
comments.body: just plain scam tokens nothing more, quite literally you can name your token anything you want, so of course some scammer could quite literally name their token using some large company namethat is for the purpose of scamming which is kinda trashy.

comments.author: wxa7115
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoSlater on June 13, 2023, 07:23:31 PMIt happenedhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J0egz0nnKbcWas already expecting it for months but now it's a bangerDo you actually think that Amazon would allow another company to make such reveal? If Amazon released their own coin I would venture to say that would be the news of the year for this market and every single reputable publication will take the time to analyze why this is the case and what it means for this market going forward.But since this is not the case and other users have found out that your sources are wrong then we can tell this coin is being released by a scammer, which unfortunately will be able to convince a great deal of people that this news is real even if it is not, as it could even convince you this was the case.

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: Why would Amazon hide it? Media houses have a habit of speculating, bragging and sometime creating fake news to manipulate the market. The simplest way to verify if this news is legit or not is to waite for an official announcement from Amazon. Till now they have not said anything about this token. There was a scam presale of the same token that was launched last year. It went on to trend for sometime but later was found to be scam.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: The Youtube channel is obviously fake only has one video, they may have purchased the channel and changed its username to make it appear that its Coinmarketcap because of the huge number of subscribers, scammers are good at imitation and cloning a new investor will likely get scam.The title is misleading its not Coinmarket and I have this feeling that OP was paid to shill this token he better change the title or people will be suspicious, you don't believe in a video if it's coming from the top online companies it should come from their owner, not from the random guy and it will be covered by big Crypto media.I expect the video to be deleted in a few days and hopefully no one will invest in this scam token.

comments.author: bitkanu
comments.body: definitely scam, anyone should just never trust coin that's just randomly being created out of nowhere moreover trying to use the name of big company that already famous enough just for the sake of getting attention.these are scams, if these company really wanna make their coin they'd have done advertising in their platform but nah, these are just scam in short.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoSlater on June 13, 2023, 07:23:31 PMIt happenedhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J0egz0nnKbcWas already expecting it for months but now it's a bangerIf this were really true, then this news would have been published by all the leading media, and not by an unknown YouTube channel. In addition, Amazon itself would definitely have reported this in its official social networks and on its website. But since no such news has been published, you'll probably have to wait a long time.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: You have been trying to scam people with fake urls for a while now. Sadly that's not a reason to get kicked from this forum. What makes me sad is this probably works for some newbs as that's the reason you are even bothering to do the scam. I personally think this is the lowest of a low scam and people like you are the reason crypto is synonymous to scamming for public.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: This is scam, and when the user was asked about official links, he gave the YouTube channel link, which is not considered an official thing, so either the user is trying to promote scam, or he does not know anything.Amazon will not launch a token, Amazon has strong links with banks and will not risk all those relationships and advertising money to launch a token. If they want to do so, they should start research and hire people in this field, which did not happen, then it is scam.

comments.author: raidarksword
comments.body: I would wait for the official news on Amazon social media pages just to ensure legitimacy and safe. The channel was already terminated as I looked into and it clearly shows it was a scam all along. Only newbies are getting this kind of fishy projects that using the big brands just to make a fuss in the industry but majority now are wise and practicing DYOR in any project that using fake names just to scam people.

comments.author: FahriZah
comments.body: Still now AMAZON not announced in any social media like twitter,facebook,reddit,Instagram no have any newest post about amazon crypto related post when amazon will make post about crypto than we can see the first post in Twitter officials page of Amazon we don,t worry and avoid all scam news now take care and stay tuned with Amazon Twitter for farther news.

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: Quote from: raidarksword on June 15, 2023, 09:09:08 AMI would wait for the official news on Amazon social media pages just to ensure legitimacy and safe. The channel was already terminated as I looked into and it clearly shows it was a scam all along. Only newbies are getting this kind of fishy projects that using the big brands just to make a fuss in the industry but majority now are wise and practicing DYOR in any project that using fake names just to scam people.You can at least try to read a few posts above you or didn't you even know how to read? It has been confirmed by some members as a scam link and token. Im thinking about scammer is now trying a new method to spread his trap. This kind of trick was a new way to fooling people to believe if such news was true. OP is a blatant scammer. I guess he has also another account to spread the scam link and token.
